question: Indradhanush Mission aims to:
option1: strengthen the market for energy efficiency by creating conducive business models
option2: revamp functioning of public sector banks
option3: reduce the annual deaths due to chronic diseases in the country
option4: connect major Indian cities to national highways grid
answer: revamp functioning of public sector banks
explanation: Indradhanush Mission aims to revamp functioning of public sector banks in India. The seven elements which will be focussed in the mission include appointments, board of bureau, capitalisation, de-stressing, and empowerment, framework of accountability and governance reforms.  The government outlined the structure of a seven-member Bank Board Bureau that will oversee the appointments process at public sector banks and provide advisory services.
